title: Vampyre (attribute)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The vampyre attribute is assigned to vampyres and modifies the type of damage they can receive. There are three different vampyre types.

content:
This article is about the monster type. For the race, see Vampyre.

The vampyre attribute is assigned to vampyres and modifies the type of damage they can receive. There are three different vampyre types.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Tier 1 Vampyres
  • 3 Tier 2 Vampyres
  • 4 Tier 3 Vampyres

Effects[edit | edit source]

  • The Ivandis flail has a 20% damage bonus against vampyres.
  • The Blisterwood sickle has a 15% damage bonus and 5% accuracy bonus against vampyres.
  • The Blisterwood flail has a 25% damage bonus and 5% accuracy bonus against vampyres.
  • Depending on the tier, a vampyre may be immune to some weapons as described in more detail below.

Tier 1 Vampyres[edit | edit source]

Tier 1 vampyres may be harmed by any weapon. That being said, Vampyre Juveniles may only be fully defeated by use of the Retainer special attack followed by a dose of Guthix balance.

Tier 2 Vampyres[edit | edit source]

Tier 2 vampyres are immune to non-silver weaponry. Efaritay's aid can alternatively be used to enable hits of up to 10 damage. That being said, Vampyre Juvinates may only be fully defeated by use of the Retainer special attack followed by a dose of Guthix balance.

Tier 3 Vampyres[edit | edit source]

Tier 3 vampyres are immune to all weaponry except for the Ivandis flail or Blisterwood flail. Efaritay's aid does NOT work on tier 3 vampyres.

rawContent:
{{otheruses|the monster type|the race|Vampyre}}
The '''vampyre attribute''' is assigned to vampyres and modifies the type of damage they can receive. There are three different vampyre types.

==Effects==
*The [[Ivandis flail]] has a 20% damage bonus against vampyres.
*The [[Blisterwood sickle]] has a 15% damage bonus and 5% accuracy bonus against vampyres.
*The [[Blisterwood flail]] has a 25% damage bonus and 5% accuracy bonus against vampyres.
*Depending on the tier, a vampyre may be immune to some weapons as described in more detail below.

==Tier 1 Vampyres==
Tier 1 vampyres may be harmed by any weapon. That being said, [[Vampyre Juvenile]]s may only be fully defeated by use of the ''[[Retainer]]'' special attack followed by a dose of [[Guthix balance]].

{{Bestiarytable|fromlevel=1|tolevel=2000|levelsort=no|attribute=vampyre1}}

==Tier 2 Vampyres==
Tier 2 vampyres are immune to non-[[silver weaponry]]. [[Efaritay's aid]] can alternatively be used to enable hits of up to 10 damage. That being said, [[Vampyre Juvinate]]s may only be fully defeated by use of the ''[[Retainer]]'' special attack followed by a dose of [[Guthix balance]].

{{Bestiarytable|fromlevel=1|tolevel=2000|levelsort=no|attribute=vampyre2}}

==Tier 3 Vampyres==
Tier 3 vampyres are immune to all weaponry except for the [[Ivandis flail]] or [[Blisterwood flail]]. [[Efaritay's aid]] does NOT work on tier 3 vampyres.

{{Bestiarytable|fromlevel=1|tolevel=2000|levelsort=no|attribute=vampyre3}}

{{Monster attribute}}
